title: BRIEF-Metro Pacific Investments Says Unit Signed JV Agreement With Dumaguete City Water District
text:
BRIEF-Metro Pacific Investments Says Unit Signed JV Agreement With Dumaguete City Water District

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Sep 04, 2019 09:40)

BRIEF-Metro Pacific Investments Says Unit Signed JV Agreement With Dumaguete City Water District Sept 4 (Reuters) - Metro Pacific Investments Corp :

* UNIT SIGNED JV AGREEMENT WITH DUMAGUETE CITY WATER

DISTRICT

* PROJECT COST FOR 25-YEAR JV IS ESTIMATED AT 1.62 BILLION

PESOS,

WITH INITIAL EQUITY INVESTMENT OF 700 MILLION PESOS



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSX5CD6nh

Further company coverage: MPI.PS





BRIEF-Metro Pacific Investments Says Unit Signed JV Agreement With Dumaguete City Water District
description: BRIEF-Metro Pacific Investments Says Unit Signed JV Agreement With Dumaguete City Water District
